# entityIdentifierString

**Instance Property**

The `AppEntity`’s identifier value as a `String`.

## Declaration

```swift
var entityIdentifierString: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Note: Due to system-imposed limitations, **the length of this value can not exceed 4096 characters**!
